Name: de Oesterbar
Review Text: In some super poshy area Leidseplein. Food is a bit too salty to my tastebuds. The staff are super gracious. A fine dining in the category. Price is a bit above average - mind you the seafood are fresh .. and mind the location, and the interior 😊 - Overall it s nice, and OK. Glad we visited.

Name: de Oesterbar
Review Text: This place is a restaurant and you have to wait a decent amount of time, so advise going there when you are not in a hurry and want to spend some time tasting seafood in a calm manner.

Name: de Oesterbar
Review Text: Know this place for many years! Since owner has changed, place gone too bad. Poor service, low quality food. We were not served what we order and even felt bad after. Do not believe pictures of the place, it is not the same anymore. Very sad and disappointed.

Name: de Oesterbar
Review Text: quality seafood, served nicely and relatively fast, with friendly staff. the prices are medium to high, but totally recommend it for a great experience.

Name: de Oesterbar
Review Text: Service is kind and efficient, but place is really too much expensive, in particular considering the quality of dishes. Impossible to take a bottle of wine, unless you want to spend at least 50 euro... and you can find the same bottle for …

Name: de Oesterbar
Review Text: the food was really delicious I would like to have thanked the chef directly who prepared my meal had never eaten such a rich dish

Name: de Oesterbar
Review Text: Very bad experience! Place is very dirty, dirty floor, dirty walls. Very rude staff and poor service! For the price they ask it has to be much better. Will never go again.

Name: de Oesterbar
Review Text: extremely good food very friendly and prices are high but for the food served it's within reason

Name: de Oesterbar

Name: de Oesterbar
